title: Couple question about dowloand and upload Mbps
body:
Hi everyone!

Im now living at LA ( El monte ) and have a question about Mbps. If u guy dont might, pls help me

My download Mbps is 20.20 Mbps and upload is 11.99 Mbps, Ping is 18 ms. So can I play LOL without lagging  ?

Thanks

replies.body: The data communicated between yourself and the game server can only be sent so fast and so far.  Honestly, the best way to really find out is by testing it in a custom game.  You can then use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis and make a decision best fit for you!
